item.description:
WEEKDAY OUTING ANNOUNCEMENT

WHEN: 1-2 hours starting at the posted time

WHERE TO MEET*: At the posted time, with 1/2 hour leeway for late-comers.

DIRECTIONS: From 93N:
1. Winchester Highlands exit.
2. Off the ramp take left and immediate right and follow signs to Stoneham (if any) and not Winchester (which is the opposite direction).
3. Continue straight about 1/2 mile to the intersection. Friendly's ice cream will be on your left.
4. Straight to the Stone Zoo. Pull into the parking lot. We will meet on your furthest left of that parking lot, next to the lake.

FROM 93S
1. take Fellsway West Winchester exit.
2. Off the ramp follow signs for route 28 by bearing slight right.
3. Continue straight about 2 miles to the lights. Friendly's ice cream will be on your left.
4. Take a right and then continue reading #4 above.

OTHER:
RSVPs: Not necessary

THINGS TO BRING WHICH ARE OFTEN FORGOTTEN:
Mosquito repellant, Paper towels, Sweater

IF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.

INCLEMENT WEATHER: It is up to you to determine if the weather makes painting untenable. Although, I will try to leave a message on my voice mail if I myself do not intend to be there.

Michael Emerald
617/968-0627
westpointusma@yahoo.com
item.name: PLEIN AIR OUTING: Stoneham Spot Pond
